data.name: ZOSPy
data.description: Wrapper around the Zemax OpticStudio API. Provides a more pythonic and intuitive way to interact with the ZOS-API through python using a .NET connection.

evidence: "Wrapper around the Ansys OpticStudio API that provides a more intuitive way to interact with the ZOS-API through Python" (indicates a Python library wrapping another API, i.e., a dependency module).

"It thereby allows you to do more optics modelling with less coding." and the example showing optical system creation and analysis indicate it directly performs domain-specific optical modelling for research.

checks.reason: no binaries found in the repo
